title: OpenCode OpenAI Codex Auth Plugin Config

$schema.description: JSON schema reference for editor autocompletion

codexMode.description: Deprecated legacy field. Bridge mode has been removed and this flag is now a no-op.

accountSelectionStrategy.description: How to select accounts when 2+ accounts are configured.

pidOffsetEnabled.description: Offset starting account by process PID (helps parallel agents spread across accounts).

perProjectAccounts.description: Store account state per project when repo-local storage is enabled.

tokenRefreshSkewMs.description: Milliseconds before token expiry to refresh proactively.

proactiveTokenRefresh.description: Enable background proactive token refresh scheduling.

authDebug.description: Enable auth debug logging for troubleshooting.

schedulingMode.description: Rate-limit scheduling strategy used when selecting accounts.

maxCacheFirstWaitSeconds.description: Maximum cache-first wait time (seconds) before switching strategy.

switchOnFirstRateLimit.description: Switch accounts immediately on first rate-limit when possible.

rateLimitDedupWindowMs.description: Window (ms) used to deduplicate repeated rate-limit events.

rateLimitStateResetMs.description: Delay (ms) before stale rate-limit state is reset.

defaultRetryAfterMs.description: Default retry-after delay (ms) when headers are missing.

maxBackoffMs.description: Maximum backoff delay (ms) applied by retry logic.

requestJitterMaxMs.description: Maximum random jitter (ms) applied to outbound requests.

retryAllAccountsRateLimited.description: When all accounts are rate limited, wait and retry automatically.

retryAllAccountsMaxWaitMs.description: Maximum wait time (ms) when all accounts are rate limited. 0 = no limit.

retryAllAccountsMaxRetries.description: Maximum number of all-accounts wait cycles.
